post:
**ClickVPS.net** offers **affordable** VPS servers with **great features** and **good performance**. Just basic servers, without add-ons or services you don't need, and **with the prices you want to pay**.

[https://www.clickvps.net/](https://www.clickvps.net/)

Our brand represents a division of Andrino, a small but well stablished company based in Spain that provides professional internet services, backed by a passionate team of people with years of experience running servers, so even if you're buying a budget VPS hosting service, you won't be dealing with a shady, unreliable company!

*Test IPv4:* 91.243.75.15  
*Test IPv6:* 2a00:1ca8:3f:5::1

★☆★ **FAQ** ★☆★

** *No way, I'm missing something out. Why is it so cheap!?!?* **  
We know that many things usually included with a VPS service are unnecessary for a tiny non-critical server.  
You might need a server for testing your new web app, monitoring your other servers, or hosting your personal website, and you want it to be as affordable as possible.  

** *What virtualization technology you use?* **  
We use OpenVZ as container-based virtualization technology, which provides proper isolation and almost zero overhead by sharing the same kernel.

** *How can I pay?* **  
We accept all major Credit/Debit cards such as Visa, MasterCard and American Express. We also accept PayPal.

★☆★ **More questions?** ★☆★  
We're happy to help! Contact us at support(at)clickvps.net :) !


\* VAT applies for EU customers without a valid registered VAT number.
VAT rate depending on customer place of residence (EU MOSS VAT ruling)
